name: iso
tagline: A self-hosted bookmark and link manager with tags, notes, and search
description: iso is a small self hosted bookmark and link management service. It allows saving URLs with tags and notes, searching through them and organizing reading material via a clean, keyboard friendly interface.

features.title: ISO Catalog Management
features.description: Organizes and catalogs ISO image files

features.title: File Listing
features.description: Displays available ISO files with metadata

features.title: Tagging and Descriptions
features.description: Adds labels and descriptions to ISO entries

features.title: Search Functionality
features.description: Searches ISO images by name or metadata

features.title: Download Access
features.description: Provides direct access to ISO files

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manages ISO collections through a browser

features.title: Self-Hosted ISO Catalog
features.description: Runs the catalog on your own infrastructure
